You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &uscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Uscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4B0.
  * `&uscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4CA.
